mapper.select: select count(*) FROM crtroom c JOIN crt_detail_inf d ON c.crtroom_no = d.crtroom_no JOIN attach a ON c.crtroom_no = a.attach_table_pk WHERE a.attach_table_div = 'cd' AND a.attach_turn = 1 AND c.crtroom_region = #{crtroomRegion} AND min_price > #{minPrice}

SELECT cr.crtroom_no , cr.host_id , cr.crtroom_name , cr.crtroom_exp , cr.crtroom_region , cr.crtroom_location , cr.crtroom_operate_start_time , cr.crtroom_operate_end_time , cr.crtroom_caution , cr.crtroom_use_guide , cr.crtroom_regi_date , cr.crtroom_state , FIND_CATEGORY_NAME(cr.crtroom_state) crtroom_state_name , count(cdi.crt_detail_no) crt_count FROM crtroom cr LEFT OUTER JOIN crt_detail_inf cdi ON cr.crtroom_no = cdi.crtroom_no GROUP BY cr.crtroom_no , cr.host_id , cr.crtroom_name , cr.crtroom_exp , cr.crtroom_region , cr.crtroom_location , cr.crtroom_operate_start_time , cr.crtroom_operate_end_time , cr.crtroom_caution , cr.crtroom_use_guide , cr.crtroom_regi_date , cr.crtroom_state HAVING cr.host_id = #{hostId} ORDER BY crtroom_no

SELECT cr.crtroom_no , cr.crtroom_name , cr.crtroom_exp , cr.crtroom_region , cr.crtroom_location , cr.crtroom_operate_start_time , cr.crtroom_operate_end_time , cr.crtroom_caution , cr.crtroom_use_guide , cr.crtroom_regi_date , cr.host_id , MIN(cdi.crt_use_price) min_price FROM crtroom cr JOIN crt_detail_inf cdi ON cr.crtroom_no = cdi.crtroom_no GROUP BY cr.crtroom_no , cr.crtroom_name , cr.crtroom_exp , cr.crtroom_region , cr.crtroom_location , cr.crtroom_operate_start_time , cr.crtroom_operate_end_time , cr.crtroom_caution , cr.crtroom_use_guide , cr.crtroom_regi_date , cr.host_id HAVING cr.crtroom_no = #{crtroomNo}

SELECT CRT_DETAIL_NO , CRT_USE_PRICE , CRTROOM_NO , USE_UNIT_TIME , CRT_INDOOR_OUTDOOR , FIND_CATEGORY_NAME(crt_indoor_outdoor) crt_indoor_outdoor_name FROM CRT_DETAIL_INF WHERE crtroom_no = #{crtroomNo}

select a.attach_origin_name , a.attach_save_name , a.attach_path , a.attach_ext , a.attach_table_div , a.attach_table_pk FROM attach a JOIN crt_detail_inf c ON a.attach_table_pk = c.crtroom_no WHERE a.attach_table_div= 'cd' AND c.crtroom_no = #{crtroomNo}
SELECT mem_id , phone_no FROM mem WHERE mem_id = #{hostId}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT cr.crtroom_no , cr.crtroom_name , cr.crtroom_location , MIN(cdi.crt_use_price) min_price , a.attach_path , TRUNC(SUM(r.review_star)/COUNT(r.review_no)) avg_star , COUNT(r.review_no) count_review FROM crtroom cr JOIN crt_detail_inf cdi ON cr.crtroom_no = cdi.crtroom_no JOIN attach a ON cr.crtroom_no = a.attach_table_pk LEFT OUTER JOIN review r ON cr.crtroom_no = r.crtroom_no WHERE a.attach_table_div = 'cd' AND a.attach_turn = 1 AND cr.crtroom_region = #{crtroomRegion} AND cr.crtroom_no <> #{crtroomNo} AND cr.crtroom_state = 'm2' GROUP BY cr.crtroom_no , cr.crtroom_name , cr.crtroom_location , a.attach_path) WHERE rownum < 8

SELECT * FROM (SELECT cr.crtroom_no , cr.crtroom_name , cr.crtroom_location , MIN(cdi.crt_use_price) min_price , a.attach_path , TRUNC(SUM(r.review_star)/COUNT(r.review_no)) avg_star , COUNT(r.review_no) count_review FROM crtroom cr JOIN crt_detail_inf cdi ON cr.crtroom_no = cdi.crtroom_no JOIN attach a ON cr.crtroom_no = a.attach_table_pk LEFT OUTER JOIN review r ON cr.crtroom_no = r.crtroom_no WHERE a.attach_table_div = 'cd' AND a.attach_turn = 1 AND cr.crtroom_state = 'm2' GROUP BY cr.crtroom_no , cr.crtroom_name , cr.crtroom_location , a.attach_path , a.attach_in_date ORDER BY a.attach_in_date desc) WHERE rownum < 8
SELECT * FROM crtroom WHERE crtroom_name LIKE '%'||#{str}||'%'

SELECT r.mem_id , r.review_ctt , r.review_star , r.review_write_date , r.review_edit_date , r.reserve_no , a.attach_path , r.review_no FROM review r LEFT OUTER JOIN attach a ON r.review_no = a.attach_table_pk AND a.attach_table_div = 'cr' WHERE r.crtroom_no = #{crtroomNo} ORDER BY 4 desc

SELECT r.mem_id , r.review_ctt , r.review_star , r.review_write_date , r.review_edit_date , r.reserve_no , a.attach_path , r.review_no FROM review r LEFT OUTER JOIN attach a ON r.review_no = a.attach_table_pk AND a.attach_table_div = 'cr' WHERE r.review_no = #{reviewNo}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT reserve_no FROM reserve WHERE crtroom_no = #{crtroomNo} AND mem_id = #{memId} AND reserve_state = 'i2' ORDER BY reserve_no desc) WHERE rownum = 1

SELECT c.crtroom_no , c.host_id , c.crtroom_name , c.crtroom_exp , FIND_CATEGORY_NAME(c.crtroom_region) crtroom_region , c.crtroom_location , c.crtroom_operate_start_time , c.crtroom_operate_end_time , c.crtroom_caution , c.crtroom_use_guide , c.crtroom_regi_date , FIND_CATEGORY_NAME(c.crtroom_state) crtroom_state , FIND_CATEGORY_NAME(c.crtroom_region) crtroom_region_name , a.attach_path FROM crtroom c JOIN attach a ON c.crtroom_no = a.attach_table_pk WHERE a.attach_table_div = 'co' ORDER BY c.crtroom_no
SELECT count(*) FROM reserve WHERE crtroom_no = #{crtroomNo} AND reserve_state = 'i1'
